metadata.dc:author: Matusevich, Daniel
metadata.dc:description: In this presentation we will develop some ideas about possible relationships between literary narratives and psychiatry. To carry out this task we will analyze the work of some authors (Vila Matas, Guerriero, Kleinman, Franzen and others) in order to share a reflection on the current situation of psychiatry and medicine.
metadata.dc:title: La razón narrativa: apuntes de psiquiatría y narrativa.
[Psychiatry and narration].
